title: The Forerunners - In lines 31-33, speaker implies

content.prompt: In lines 31-33, the speaker implies that

choices.label: the theme of his poems remains the same
his love of poetry undermines his love of God
literary language can be used to conceal truth
no poetry can adequately describe religious faith

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
